= To test SVN without installing =

First ensure that you have subversion installed, then do

{{{
svn co http://font-manager.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ font-manager
cd font-manager
./configure
make
python src/font-manager
}}}

<br />
= To build a debian package from SVN =

{{{
wget http://font-manager.googlecode.com/svn/resources/buildscripts/build_deb.sh
chmod +x build_deb.sh
./build_deb.sh
}}}

*_Tested on Ubuntu_*


<br />
= To build an RPM package from SVN =

{{{
wget http://font-manager.googlecode.com/svn/resources/buildscripts/build_rpm.sh
chmod +x build_rpm.sh
./build_rpm.sh
}}}

*_Tested on Fedora_*
